p: Tumor Immune Estimation Resource [ 27] (TIMER, https://cistrome.shinyapps.io/timer/) was used to analyze and visualize the association between abundance of tumor immune infiltrating cells (TIICs) and PAAD-related genes through analytical modules for gene expression, somatic mutations, clinical outcomes and somatic copy number alteration. Purity Adjustment was selected using Spearman’s correlation analysis. P-values < 0.05 were considered statistically significant.
